title: Lazada Keywords Onsite Daily Report
description: Daily performance report for Lazada Keywords Onsite Campaign

Date.description: Date of the report in the format 'DD-MM-YYYY', e.g., '08-11-2023'

Campaign_Name.description: Name of the Lazada Keywords Onsite Campaign, e.g., 'KEEPLEY - SEARCH - LEGO - NO END DO NOT DELETE'

Campaign_ID.description: Unique identifier for the campaign, e.g., 101100028426296.0

Promoted_Products.description: Name of the promoted product, e.g., 'QMAN Trans-Collector Mecha Dinosaur Deformation Robot Warlord Set 6 in 1 Building Blocks Children Toys, Gift for Kids, Boys ages  6 years and above'

Promoted_Product_ID_the_ID_of_this_produ.description: ID of the promoted product in the promotion campaign, e.g., 1783152410.0

Product_ID_the_ID_of_this_product_in_Pro.description: ID of the product in Product Management, e.g., 3837932576.0

Keywords.description: Keywords associated with the campaign, e.g., 'lego'

Match_Type.description: Match type for the keywords, e.g., 'Broad Match'

Add_To_Cart_Units.description: Number of units added to cart

Direct_Add_To_Cart_Units.description: Number of units directly added to cart
